record.dc:title: 261GP22, 15GP22, Greenup County, Kentucky. Hardin Village. Pits, Feature No. 232.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Fort Ancient Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Photograph of three "post-pits" in and under central fire basin Feature No. 67. Feature 232: Irregular long pit, vertical walls, flat bottom. Starts high in occupational stratum, hence edges ill-defined. Purpose not apparent.
record.wpa:comments: Description of Feature 232 and Photo do not seem to correspond. Feature on photo may be misnumbered, although Feature 67 is the central fire basin for House "M". More information about Features, including diagrams, available at institution.
